description: Atrium seeks funding of 375,000 USD for a time-period of 100 days to create Episode 2 of the Nouns Movie. The project involves developing the script, creating preview trailers, and producing the finished Episode 2 with a runtime of 10.5 - 11 mins. The team at Atrium is composed of independent artists and creators with experience from renowned studios like Pixar, Marvel, Sony, and Netflix. The movie is set in the floating cloud city of Blus and follows the protagonist Noun as he teams up with misfits to save the city from the plot of the ruthless frowns. The movie's genre is Action and Comedy.

project.name: Nouns Movie
project.description: The Nouns Movie project aims to produce cinematic content with veteran talent from various disciplines.

title: Nouns : A Movie - Chapter 2 ⌐◨-◨
